Mensdata.title: 2 in 1 Wool Town Coat

productdetails.Bleach: do not bleach; dry: tumble dry - normal (low heat); dry clean: do not dry clean iron: do not iron; wash: machine wash- cold (30°c)
productdetails.weight: ts weighty, warm comfort is unmatched when it comes to those dreary days and wouldn't look out of place on a typical london street, embodying the high-quality superdry craftsmanship that celebrates classic british charm.
